explanation: [0-0] On a gray brick floor, from left to right, are Mountain Dew, Coca-Cola, Fanta, and Sprite, neatly arranged in a row. On top of each bottle is a string of white, spiral Mentos mints. In the background is green vegetation and trees.
[0-3] Next, four hands simultaneously put the white spiral Mentos mints into the bottles.

[0-3] Next, four hands simultaneously put the white spiral Mentos mints into the bottles.

[3-5] Immediately, Sprite and Coca-Cola erupt with a large amount of white and brown foam, while Fanta produces a relatively small amount of yellow foam, and Mountain Dew only a little bit of green foam. The foam overflows onto the ground.
